A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is for those who love to be divided on a topic. If you watch this movie after watching every other Star Wars movie\, you will feel polarised. This whole movie was a subversion of the feel of Star Wars. This movie's greatest flaw\, is not following it's source( The Force Awakens) and not setting up the future( The Rise of Skywalker). As a result\, this movie in a bubble is excellent\, but when it's shown to be the centre of a trilogy\, it does a terrible job.
